text: Neustadt bei Coburg is a German city in the North of Franconia. It has an population of about 17,000. It is near Coburg. Its mayor is Frank Rebhan (SPD). ==Sister cities== * Sonneberg, Germany * Villeneuve-sur-Lot, France * Member in the City Friendship Neustadt (Newton) in Europe ==Traffic== Next important traffic routes are in Coburg. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Coburg (district)
title: Neustadt bei Coburg
